title: Set home page as default route

requirements.text: Configure the application routing so that the home page displays when users first open the application, instead of the project page

quotes: Is showing the first page as the project page while opening it I need it to show the home page

acceptanceCriteria: Opening the application root URL displays the home page
The project page remains accessible via its specific route

nonGoals: Removing or redesigning the project page
Changing the content of either the home page or project page
